001package gbw.melange.common.shading;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShaderProgram;
004
005/**
006 * (int indexToBindTo, ShaderProgram program) -> void
007 */
008@FunctionalInterface
009public interface ShaderResourceBinding {
010    /**
011     * @param bindIndex managed, unique index to bind a resource to for this shader
012     * @param program the shader program itself
013     */
014    void bind(int bindIndex, ShaderProgram program);
015}
